alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 4:35PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Hendry and southwestern Palm Beach Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 435 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, or 16 miles south of South Bay, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Holey Land Wildlife Refuge and Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
